annotation_sentence: Uh, yes, thank you. I, um, like to do... uh, running. I run in park, maybe three times week.

annotation_sentence: I run, um, maybe... thirty minutes? Sometimes more, if I have, uh... how to say... energy.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I want to, uh, lose weight and maybe... build muscle, too.

annotation_sentence: Okay, sounds good. I am, uh, excited to learn. Is it, um, difficult?
